title: Sigma E25 - Blending
description:
Unique Feature: Wide and slightly flat, firmer bristle blender
Function: Controlled blending
Recommended Use: Blend colors together onto the lid with added control. Buff out harsh lines for a well-blended effect.

 2013 Sigma Enterprises, LLC

title: Sigma F10 - Powder/Blush
description:
Unique Feature: Very soft and slightly beveled
Function: Precise placement of blush
Recommended Use: Use for powder application.

 2013 Sigma Enterprises, LLC

title: Sigma F35 - Tapered Highlighter
description:
Unique Feature: Small and tapered with a precise tip
Function: Subtle highlighting
Recommended Use: Apply highlighting shades onto the upper contours of the face. Diffused finish gives skin a natural glow.

 2013 Sigma Enterprises, LLC

title: Sigma P84 - Precision Angled TM
description:
Unique Feature: Small, dense and flat angled head
Function: Precise contouring
Recommended Use: Apply product to areas such as the sides of the nose and the hollows of the cheeks.
Bristle Type: Synthetic Sigmax

 2013 Sigma Enterprises, LLC
